reviews.review: I love this game it is a lot of fun and they are always adding new things.

Es muy dinámico e intenso, perfecto para los jugadores que buscan estar en constante tensión, ya sea para no perder o salvar a tus compañeros, además cuenta con bastantes personajes clásicos y simbólicos en la cultura del cine y juegos de terror que incluye el Dead By Daylight, sin dudas el mejor juego para jugar con amigos!
O jogo em si é muito bom, eu adorei a jogabilidade e a forma como eles fazem as skills dos killers funcionarem é genial, mas tem alguns bugs pequenos em alguns mapas, fora isso o jogo é maravilhoso.
e

very thicc

Initially enjoyed this game but anymore it's just a dirty cheap motel that I for some reason keep coming back to in the hopes that it's been renovated; it's full of bugs, toxicity and leaves you feeling dirtier than when you first checked in. I've played survivor and killer and it's rare to play a match without either parties being disgusting. I've had more fun playing KWF (Kill with friends using custom/private matches) with the very rare public match being enjoyable. I still recommend this game because it holds potential but until BHVR/DbD has a threat to it, i.e. competition from another game/s that could drive players to leave DbD for a better experience, I don't think they will do much to fix things in DbD. If you end up getting into this just be prepared for a LOT of trolling, toxic gameplay, teabagging, flashlight flicking survivors, face camping, slugging and tunneling from killers.

Thrilling, exciting, suspenseful, but also not incredibly hard. I got into immediately. Super fun to work together with friends! Also, I love the fact that you don't always have to WIN to improve your stats/play style.

Patch 6.1 ruined the game for survivors. It is extremely difficult to escape. 
Developers want to balance the game as such TWO escape TWO dead however most games are FOUR dead. It is boring once ONE or TWO survivors are dead. It is extremely difficult to complete all generators especially it takes 10 seconds longer to repair them. 
It felt pointless to continue doing generator once TWO are dead. 
It was safer to hide and wait for team mate to die then find hatch.
Brain cells gone.

Apesar da comunidade mais toxica ja existente em um jogo, vale mt a pena, passo horas e horas jogando e me divertindo (é só colocar em mente que se a partida for ruim por causa dos outros, ir pra próxima sem dar ibope ou arrumar amigos pra jogar em time fechado). Melhor jogo <3

The game is fun, i will go ahead and call it unique as only a few games sharing this genre have been successful in executing a game like this unlike the other similar games i've played. As all games it has its bugs and all but it's fun to play especially if you have friends. The game does become repetitive over time and you might want to take a break from it but you'll always come back to it. The game could use a lot more content updates especially in game modes, items maybe maps more different from one another with specific interactive map things like doors,walkways etc more this just simple pallets or vaulting windows. This game has a lot of potential.
